text: Runing into a weird issue that we have modules that are moved out of the root folder and into a theme if a similar version exists (by name). Seems to happen when a theme is copied into a portal via the UI
Anyone else seeing any strange rendering issues with their themes? I am only seeing it on one portal, but it seems like the css files are not getting processed properly.
i just saw strange rendering, but only in the Page Editor, not on the page itself
Strange. When I edit the page, it all looks correct. When I ‘preview’ the page, it is all kinds of busted. It definitely seems to be a css processing issue of some kind
I had a client with that issue. We had to clone the theme to get it to work properly. : /
Well, that is super fun. Did you try a child theme by chance or anything? <@U39DT5YFL>
Nope,, haven't really done anything with child themes.
